sentences.sContent: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.
sentences.sCn: 他的讽刺如期伤到了她。

remMethod.val: barb原也指倒翘的胡子， 后来胡子一词变为beard

words.tran: 有刺的；讽刺的；有倒钩的
讽刺（barb的过去分词）；装倒钩

trans.tranCn: 鱼钩， 倒钩； 挖苦的话
trans.tranOther: the sharp curved point of a hook,  arrow  etc that prevents it from being easily pulled out
